In ANZ Grindlays Bank PLC Vs. Mini: enunciated by the Court of Appeal that

it was: “there  was  no  Trade  Dispute  or  any  dispute  at  the  time  the
Employee tendered his resignation. A dispute can be referred for
settlement  only  if  the  Dispute  arose  while  the  relationship  of
Employer-Workman  subsists.  The  Minister  cannot  act  under
S4(1)  where  there  was  no  industrial  dispute  Ping  at  the  time

In ANZ Grindlays Bank PLC Vs. Mini: when the Workman ceased to be an employee”
